assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: National Cleaning Company K.P.S.C. provides cleaning services in Kuwait, Turkey, Iraq, and India. Its services include municipal waste management comprising city cleaning, and waste collection and disposal services; solid and liquid refuse removal and cleaning, including clearing of building debris, and removal of house wreckages and leftovers in the residential and industrial network; and agricultural contracting and landscaping services. The company also offers environmental waste management services consisting of oil lakes profile survey and rehabilitation, petroleum sludge management, soil treatment boreholes assessment, anaerobic thermal desorption unit, electrochemical soil treatment, bioremediation, soil washing, crude oil tanks sludge quantification, tanks cleaning, API separator maintenance, API separators skimming pumps, heat exchanger cleaning, spill response and chemical accident, hazardous waste landfill construction and operation, solid waste reception and treatment station, refineries/petrochemical plants waste management, industrial wastewater treatment, domestic sewage waste water treatment plant, car wash water recycling, oily water treatment, and leachate treatment plant. In addition, it provides indoor cleaning, including ordinary residential cleaning, office and industrial cleaning, carpet cleaning, and upholstery or window cleaning; and pest control services, such as general pest control for crawling and flying insects, rodent control for domestic and industrial sector, pre and post construction termite control, timber treatment, food processing plant fumigation, warehouse treatment, stray animal control, and agricultural pest control. Further, the company is also engaged in the marketing and selling of asphalt products; trading of animals and crops; investment in money market; and real estate activities. National Cleaning Company K.P.S.C. was incorporated in 1978 and is based in Kuwait City, Kuwait.
